mapper.sql: Eid, USERID, EMAILS, SUBJECT, CONTENT, SENDTIME, FILES, STATUS
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(EID) EID FROM EMAIL WHERE USERID = #{userid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMAIL (EID,USERID, EMAILS, SUBJECT, CONTENT, SENDTIME, FILES, STATUS) VALUES (sys_guid(),#{userid}, #{emails}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{sendtime}, #{files}, #{status})
